message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses a neural network model that uses synaptic stochasticity for unsupervised learning and Monte Carlo sampling. This falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of local synaptic plasticity rules, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the potential for these models to be used in brain-inspired hardware, which falls under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NI).
